question.title: What is a key component of the care plan for a patient with a neuro-cognitive disorder?

option_a.title: Introduction of the Alzheimer's disease treatment (ALD 15)
option_a.description: A medication treatment for Alzheimer's disease

option_c.title: Cognitive remediation by a speech therapist
option_c.description: A therapy to improve cognitive function

option_d.title: Management of comorbidities and cardiovascular risk factors

correct_option.title: I
correct_option.description: Provision of aids after regular assessment of the impact of cognitive impairment on functional independence
